description.value: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

After the [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales its Poison Breath, wisps of poisonous gas laced with the alchemical taint that permeates the dragonâ€™s body linger around it. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Poison Breath is unavailable, each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be terrified, as the gas causes the creature to experience frightful hallucinations. A terrified creature is &Reference[frightened]{frightened}, and its speed is reduced to 0.
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.
The dragon uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Every creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]â€™s choice within 120 ft. of it must succeed on a [[/save]] save or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect for itself on a success. If a creatureâ€™s save succeeds or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]â€™s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically detects every creature and trap within 30 feet of it, pinpointing the current location of each.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] roars at up to two creatures of its choice within 120 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a [[/save]] save or be vulnerable to poison damage until the end of its next turn. A target resistant to poison damage isnâ€™t resistant to it for the duration. A target immune to poison damage is still immune to it, even if the target fails the save.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save]] save or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can then fly up to half its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
